name: pirka - Artificial Intelligence Technology that Grows Through Conversations
description: "pirka" is an artificial intelligence that learns your language and knowledge through chat conversations, developing a unique personality. In other words, it is "a one-of-a-kind AI just for you." Its resemblance to your emotions and preferences will surely evoke a sense of familiarity.
